definition: to make a fool of oneself/to make oneself a laughing stock
to present/to bequeath
old variant of 笑[xiao4]
laugh/smile/CL:個|个[ge4]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
surname Fang

sentences.english: Her foolish actions exposed  her to ridicule.
sentences.chinese: 她的愚蠢行为贻笑大方。

definition: to be ridiculous/to make a fool of oneself
to make a fool of oneself
to try to draw a tiger but end up with a likeness of a dog (idiom)/to try to do sth overambitious and end up botching it
pinyin: hua4 hu3 bu4 cheng2 fan3 lei4 quan3

definition: to laugh one's head off/ridiculous/jaw-dropping
lit. Dong Shi imitates Xi Shi's frown (idiom)/fig. to mimick sb's idiosyncrasies but make a fool of oneself
to pick up what others say (idiom); to pass off other people's opinions as one's own/to parrot
to be the most ridiculous thing in the world (idiom)
pinyin: hua2 tian1 xia4 zhi1 da4 ji1

definition: to try to draw a tiger but end up with a likeness of a dog (idiom)/to try to do sth overambitious and end up botching it
to overreach oneself/to try to be clever and end up with egg on one's face
lit. to wield the broadsword in the presence of Lord Guan (idiom)/fig. to make a fool of oneself by showing off in front of an expert
pinyin: Guan1 gong1 mian4 qian2 shua3 da4 dao1

definition: a matter for ridicule/an object of ridicule/laughingstock
to display one's slight skill before an expert (idiom)
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
out of place/inappropriate/incongruous
to move a stone and stub one's toe/to shoot oneself in the foot (idiom)
pinyin: ban1 shi2 tou5 za2 zi4 ji3 de5 jiao3

definition: to crush one's own foot while trying to maneuver a rock (to a cliff edge, to drop on one's enemy) (idiom)/hoisted by one's own petard
pinyin: ban1 qi3 shi2 tou5 za2 zi4 ji3 de5 jiao3
